faqData.question: How does ERP help with managing building material inventory?
faqData.answer: Our ERP provides real-time inventory tracking across multiple locations, automated reorder points, and barcode scanning to ensure you always have the right materials in stock when needed, reducing stockouts and overstocking.

faqData.question: Can the system handle project-based material management?
faqData.answer: Yes, our ERP allows you to allocate inventory to specific projects, track material usage by project, and generate detailed project cost reports, helping you manage multiple construction or renovation projects efficiently.

faqData.question: Does the system support multiple pricing structures?
faqData.answer: Absolutely. The system supports various pricing models including customer-specific pricing, volume discounts, and seasonal pricing, allowing you to remain competitive in the building materials market.
